info.title: Developer Project
info.description: Manages developer projects, creating, updating and getting the proper information.

prop.name: projects
prop.description: All the projects that the given account is member of.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Initializes the project by id or by name.

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: The project id. Leave empty for new project or name initialization. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The project name. Leave empty for new project or id initialization. It is empty by default.

method.name: create
method.description: Create a new developer project.
method.returndescription: If success, return the project id created. FALSE otherwise.

method.name: getProjectAccounts
method.description:
Get all accounts connected to a project.
You must be a member of the project.
method.returndescription: An array of account id, title and person's first and last name.

method.name: getAccountProjects
method.description: Get all projects that the current account is member of.
method.returndescription: An array of all project information.

method.name: info
method.description:
Gets the project information with the given id or name.
You must be a member of the project.
method.returndescription: An array of information if project found, NULL otherwise.

method.name: getID
method.description: Gets the project id.

method.name: updateInfo
method.description:
Updates a project's basic information.
You must be a member of the project.

parameter.name: $open
parameter.description: Indicates a Redback open project. It is FALSE by default.

parameter.name: $public
parameter.description: Indicates a Redback public project. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: setName
method.description:
Sets the unique project name.
You must be a member of the project.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getRootFolder
method.description:
Gets the project's roof repository folder
You must be a member of the project.

method.name: getRepository
method.description:
Get the project's repository folder.
You must be a member of the project.

method.name: getResourcesFolder
method.description:
Get the project's resources folder.
You must be a member of the project.

method.name: getIconUrl
method.description: Get the project's icon url from the repository.

method.name: publish
method.description: Publish common project assets.

parameter.name: $version
parameter.description: The version of the project to publish.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: publishResources
method.description:
Publishes the resources of the current project to the given folder. You can provide a specific inner folder for partial coverage.
You must be a member of the project.

parameter.name: $innerFolder
parameter.description: The inner folder of the resources to be published.

parameter.name: $cleanFolder
parameter.description: If set to TRUE, it cleans the publish folder before copying. It is TRUE by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getPublishedPath
method.description:
Get the project's publish folder.
You must be a member of the project.

method.name: getReleases
method.description:
Get all project releases.
You must be a member of the project.
method.returndescription: An array of all releases in descending order according to the release creation date. Each array object contains an array with the available information of every release.

method.name: release
method.description:
Create a project release.
You must be a member of the project or the project must be public.

parameter.name: $title
parameter.description: The project release title. The project title is usually used but changes can be made.

method.returndescription: The release token on success, false on failure.

method.name: unrelease
method.description: Remove a project release from the database. The project release must not be the last release and approved. If the release goes to published or rejected status, it cannot be removed.

parameter.name: $version
parameter.description: The project release version to remove.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: validate
method.description: Validates whether the logged in account has access to this project.
method.returndescription: True is account has access, false otherwise.

method.name: remove
method.description:
Remove a project from the repository. The project must have been already deleted from the database.
You must be a member of the project.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: loadInfo
method.description: Load project info from database if project id is not set.
